H0.text: What was Her Majesty's Prison Manchester called until 1990. Manchester Gaol

H1.text: What was Her Majesty's Prison Manchester called until 1990. Belle Vue Prison

H2.text: What was Her Majesty's Prison Manchester called until 1990. Manchester Penitentiary

H3.text: What was Her Majesty's Prison Manchester called until 1990. Strangeways

A4.text: It is still commonly referred to as Strangeways, which was its former official name derived from the area in which it is located, until it was rebuilt following a major riot in 1990.
